review: To get 5 stars this needs to have more ability to play local content. I am hoping that this will happen as the SDK was recently released, however for now, I can only play local content through chrome.  This I sflawed in the chrome does not support AC3 audio format (and most 720p movies are in that format), nor does chrome natively play .mkv files. So I need to first convert the audio to AAC (I forget which program I use). I then rename the file to .mp4 and it plays. However if the audio is off I cannot resync it. Hopefully vlc player will soon be chromecast compatible and all issues will be gone.
